Name: Irresistible
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
22.5 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Rum-laced, herbal yet delicate with cleansing citrus notes.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Stanley M. Jones' 1977 Jones' Complete Barguide .
Nutrition: One serving of Irresistible contains 168 calories
